verses.verse: I will exalt <S%H7311><s%> you, <S%H430><s%> my God, the King. <S%H4428><s%> I will praise <S%H1288><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5769><s%>
Every day <S%H3117><s%> I will praise <S%H1288><s%> you. <S%H1984><s%> I will extol your name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5769><s%>
Great <S%H1419><s%> is Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and greatly <S%H3966><s%> to be praised! <S%H1984><s%> His greatness <S%H1420><s%> is unsearchable. <S%H2714><s%>
One <S%H1755><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> will commend <S%H7623><s%> your works <S%H4639><s%> to another, <S%H5046><s%> and will declare your mighty acts. <S%H1369><s%>
Of the glorious <S%H3519><s%> majesty <S%H3519><s%> of your honor, <S%H1926><s%> of your wondrous <S%H6381><s%> works, <S%H1697><s%> I will meditate. <S%H7878><s%>
Men will speak <S%H559><s%> of the might <S%H5807><s%> of your awesome acts. <S%H3372><s%> I will declare <S%H5608><s%> your greatness. <S%H1420><s%>
They will utter <S%H5042><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of your great <S%H7227><s%> goodness, <S%H2898><s%> and will sing <S%H7442><s%> of your righteousness. <S%H6666><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is gracious, <S%H2587><s%> merciful, <S%H7349><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and of great <S%H1419><s%> loving kindness. <S%H2617><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%> to all. <S%H7356><s%> His tender mercies are over all his works. <S%H4639><s%>
All your works <S%H4639><s%> will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh. Your saints <S%H2623><s%> will extol you. <S%H1288><s%>
They will speak <S%H559><s%> of the glory <S%H3519><s%> of your kingdom, <S%H4438><s%> and talk <S%H1696><s%> about your power; <S%H1369><s%>
to make known <S%H3045><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> his mighty acts, <S%H1369><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the majesty <S%H3519><s%> of his kingdom. <S%H4438><s%>

Your kingdom <S%H4438><s%> is an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> kingdom. <S%H4438><s%> Your dominion <S%H4475><s%> endures throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%> Yahweh is faithful in all his words, and loving in all his deeds.
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> upholds <S%H5564><s%> all who fall, <S%H5307><s%> and raises up <S%H2210><s%> all those who are bowed down. <S%H3721><s%>
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of all wait <S%H7663><s%> for you. <S%H5414><s%> You give them their food <S%H400><s%> in due season. <S%H6256><s%>
You open <S%H6605><s%> your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and satisfy <S%H7646><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of every living thing. <S%H2416><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%> in all his ways, <S%H1870><s%> and gracious <S%H2623><s%> in all his works. <S%H4639><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to all those who call <S%H7121><s%> on him, <S%H7121><s%> to all who call on him in truth. <S%H571><s%>
He will fulfill <S%H6213><s%> the desire <S%H7522><s%> of those who fear <S%H3373><s%> him. <S%H8085><s%> He also will hear their cry, <S%H7775><s%> and will save them. <S%H3467><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> preserves <S%H8104><s%> all those who love <S%H157><s%> him, <S%H7563><s%> but all the wicked he will destroy. <S%H8045><s%>

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> will speak <S%H1696><s%> the praise <S%H8416><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Let all flesh <S%H1320><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> forever <S%H5703><s%> and ever. <S%H5769><s%>
